startProjectDialog.title: Welcome to UI Copilot
startProjectDialog.content: Choose how you would like to begin your project
restartDialog.title: Restart
restartDialog.content: Are you sure you want to restart? This will delete all your current progress.
templatesDialog.title: Choose a template
leftSidebar.layout.caption: Drag cells to reposition and drag cell corners to resize
leftSidebar.components.caption: Drag components onto grid cells to add them to the canvas
leftSidebar.theme.caption: Select a font, theme or background color for your design
layout.tooltipLocked: Unlocking the grid allows you to move and resize cells freely on the canvas.
layout.tooltipUnlocked: Locking the grid will snap cells to the grid, and prevent them from being moved or resized.
pages.caption: Add, rename, delete, or reset pages in your project
pages.add.title: New Page
pages.add.content: Choose how you would like to add a new page:
renameDialog.title: Rename Page
theme.backgroundColor.tooltip: Change the color of the background.
settings.caption: Change the theme, language, and accessibility settings for the editor
settings.tooltip: To drag-and-drop components using the keyboard, go to your computer's accessibility settings and enable the keypad to be used as a mouse.
grid.rows.tooltip: Change the number of rows in the grid
grid.columns.tooltip: Change the number of columns in the grid
components.label: Label
